leg.name: leg
leg.transformationDescription:
A layer of smooth, almost porcelain skin quickly grows over [npc.her] legs as they shift into a new form. As the transformation ends, [npc.she] [npc.verb(see)] that [npc.her] new skin smoothly transitions into the [npc.skin] covering the rest of [npc.her] body at [npc.her] upper-thigh.
[npc.Name] now [npc.has] anthropomorphic Ralts-line legs and feet, which are [npc.materialDescriptor] [npc.legFullDescription].#IF(npc.getSubspecies()==SUBSPECIES_poke_ralts_subspecies_Kirlia || npc.getSubspecies()==SUBSPECIES_poke_ralts_subspecies_Gardevoir) [npc.Her] feet are naturally inclined to shift onto their toes like a ballet dancer.#ENDIF
leg.bodyDescription: [npc.Her] Ralts-line legs are [npc.materialCompositionDescriptor] [npc.legFullDescription(true)].#IF(npc.getSubspecies()==SUBSPECIES_poke_ralts_subspecies_Kirlia)||(npc.getSubspecies()==SUBSPECIES_poke_ralts_subspecies_Gardevoir) [npc.Her] feet are naturally inclined to shift onto their toes like a ballet dancer.#ENDIF
